column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My boyfriend and I were once again impressed by this Chicago deep dish pizza. We tried the Malnati deep dish last time with mushrooms
column2: so this visit we decided to get the Lou. We liked the Lou even more than the Malnati. It was a lighter pizza
column3: and the crust is my favorite part. This deep dish is a little less deep than the Malnati
column4: for reference. The sauce is super good
column6: and you can tell that the cheese is fresh and excellent quality. It's no wonder why Lou Malnati's is famous! Great service
column8: and overall a satisfying visit at this location!
